inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: physical examination and a DUS at the S. Orsola Malpighi hospital from 2019 to 2025

exclusion.criterion: transient ischemic attach or a stroke within the 6-months before the enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has asymptomatic carotid artery stenosis >60% with physical examination and DUS evidence. No recent transient ischemic attach or stroke within the past 6 months.
